title: ARAM SPELL Suggestion
body: Ok, so this new ARAM spell  {{summoner:32}} could be changed to allow players to express themselves a little. Why not bring back those Poros from Snowdown {{summoner:30}}? For those that bought the icon like myself, I'd like to make more use of it, and this seem like the perfect chance to do so. The addition of changing it to a Poro will not affect gameplay, and will allow players to show their Poro to the world! It also fits the brief of Howling Abyss, and who doesn't love Poros :3. So why not share some poro love and BRING THEM BACK. Let us players have fun throwing poros around!

replies.body: i had the same thought, I'm very keen for this!
I do miss Lord Gregory III
